titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building located in Nashville, Tennessee, as the "Lewis E. Moore, Sr., Post Office Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/22/1988--Introduced. Designates the United States Post Office building at 525 Royal Parkway, Nashville, Tennessee, as the Lewis E. Moore, Sr., Post Office Building.
